name: className?: string
description: CSS class for the switch component.

name: toggled?: boolean
description: Indicates whether the switch is toggled on or off.

name: size?: 'sm' | 'md' | 'lg'
description: Defines the size of the switch.

name: icons?: 'inside' | 'outside'
description: Specifies the position of the icons relative to the switch.

name: iconOn?: Snippet
description: Custom icon displayed when the switch is on.

name: color?: string
description: Specifies the color for the switch.

name: classNameSlider?: string
description: CSS class for the slider element inside the switch.

name: iconOff?: Snippet
description: Custom icon displayed when the switch is off.
